DOC.brief_summary: CONTEXT AND OBJECTIVE : Myofascial syndrome frequent condition chronic pain . The objective present study compare analgesic action acupuncture trigger point injection combine cyclobenzaprine dipyrone . DESIGN AND SETTING : A randomized study perform Pain Clinic . METHODS : Thirty patient divide two group : G1 receive trigger point injection 0.25 % bupivacaine ( 1 ml/point ) twice week , 10 mg/day cyclobenzaprine 500 mg dipyrone every 8 h. G2 submit classical trigger point acupuncture twice week . The patient ask continue physical exercise . The following parameter evaluate : pain intensity rat numerical verbal scale , quality life four week treatment , quality analgesia .
